channel.title: GIS on Abhigyan Kishor

item.title: Extending Fast(er) Downloads
item.description: Fast(er) downloads from Google Earth Engine: Tiling This series was inspired by this article by Noel Gorelick. I will try and apply his article for a more specific use case of downloading satellite imagery for a large region of interest. This article requires an understanding of the limitations of earth engine, particularly ee.Image.getDownloadURL(), because it is aimed at providing a work-around. Today we discuss the first step towards big downloads, tiling the region of interest.
